text: LEZO (укр. ЛЕЗО) – Ukrainian hip-hop band founded in 2005 in Novovolynsk, Ukraine composed of Delta, Girya, Storog and Roks. In 2008 published their album "Gostroslovy" (укр. Гострослови). Many critics consider it one of the best in Ukrainian hip-hop industry. == Discography == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title |- | 2006 || Repliky (укр. РЕПліки) |- | 2007 || Tak Gartyvalasya stal (укр. Так гартувалася сталь) |- | 2008 || Gostroslovy (укр. Гострослови) |} == Members == * Delta * Girya * Storog * Roks == Links == * * Download Gostroslovy Category:Ukrainian musical groups
title: LEZO (rap group)
